      • getMinClusterByObjective

        public double getMinClusterByObjective(int objectiveIndex)
        If SimpleKMeans, returns the min centroid value by objective index, else, in case of DBSCAN that dont have Centroid values, is verified the min value in the solutions On DBSCAN, the clusterId -1 indicates noise
        Parameters:
        objectiveIndex - Objective array index
        Returns:
        Min value by objective
